column4: anyone have a clue why my ubuntu machine would stop accepting all incoming TCP connections when I upgraded to new hardware?
(the network interface changed name from eth0 to eth1, I tried editing the udev rules to rename it back, but that did not help=
Yes, the MAC address of the network adapter for instance would be different
I don't see why that would matter, I have a static IP.
Because the system attaches for instance eth0 to mac address <whatever>
